remarks: If ` F < G ` , then there is some ` z ` witnessing this, but we can say more and in fact there is a definable expression ` X ` that also witnesses ` F < G ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-May-2015.)
statement:
cantnfs.s $e |- S = dom ( A CNF B ) $.
cantnfs.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. On ) $.
cantnfs.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. On ) $.
oemapval.t $e |- T = { <. x , y >. | E. z e. B ( ( x ` z ) e. ( y ` z ) /\ A. w e. B ( z e. w -> ( x ` w ) = ( y ` w ) ) ) } $.
oemapval.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. S ) $.
oemapval.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. S ) $.
oemapvali.r $e |- ( ph -> F T G ) $.
oemapvali.x $e |- X = U. { c e. B | ( F ` c ) e. ( G ` c ) } $.
oemapvali $p |- ( ph -> ( X e. B /\ ( F ` X ) e. ( G ` X ) /\ A. w e. B ( X e. w -> ( F ` w ) = ( G ` w ) ) ) ) $.
$d A c w x y z $.
$d B c w x y z $.
$d F c w x y z $.
$d G c w x y z $.
$d S c x y z $.
$d T c $.
$d X w x y z $.
$d c ph x y z $.
